name: Doctor Popular (@docpop@mastodon.social)
summary:
Automattic has acquired the popular ActivityPub plugin for WordPress. @pfefferle, the plugin's creator, will be joining Automattic to work on ActivityPub integrations full time.  https://wptavern.com/automattic-acquires-activitypub-plugin-for-wordpress

Here's an interview I shot with @pfefferle and @tim@mastodon.timnolte.com about the ActivityPub and Webmentions plugins, and how #WordPress and the #fediverse can be used together. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bf2Bksfof0U
